name: Zodicat
description: Playing Zodicat and Save The 12 Zodiac!!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 32 MB RAM Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 229 MB available space Additional Notes: 512 MB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 32 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (or greater) or AMD Radeon HD 7600 (or greater) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 229 MB available space Additional Notes: 4GB RAM
